alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fillmore County through 330 AM CDT... At 245 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shickley, or 27 miles south of York, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Geneva and Strang around 255 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Exeter and Milligan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
